variable.name: MED5
variable.description: Have you smoked 7 or more cigarettes or cigars per week in the past month

variable.name: MED5A
variable.description: If MED5A is "no": "Was there ever a time when you smoked an average of 7 or more cigarettes or cigars per week?"

variable.name: MED5B1
variable.description: If MED5A is "yes": "When did you last smoke 7 or more cigarettes or cigars in a week - month?"

variable.name: MED5B2
variable.description: If MED5A is "yes": " When did you last smoke 7 or more cigarettes or cigars in a week - day?"

variable.name: MED5B3
variable.description: If MED5A is "yes": "When did you last smoke 7 or more cigarettes or cigars in a week - year?"

variable.name: MED6
variable.description: In the last week: "How many alcoholic beverages have you consumed?"
